mapper.select: SELECT s.id as s_id, s.name as s_name, l.id as l_id, l.url_pattern as l_url_pattern FROM series s left join links l ON l.serie_id = s.id ORDER BY s.name
SELECT s.id as s_id, s.name as s_name, l.id as l_id, l.url_pattern as l_url_pattern FROM series s left join links l ON l.serie_id = s.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO series (name) VALUES (#{name}) RETURNING id
mapper.update: UPDATE series SET name = #{name} WHERE id = #{id}
